# Appendix A: Assessment Questionnaires {#sec-appa .unnumbered}

## Executive Assessment Questionnaire {#sec-appa-exec}

### Instructions
This questionnaire is designed for completion by executive leadership (CEO, Managing Director, Practice Leaders). Please answer each question based on your organization's current practices and capabilities.

### Data Strategy & Governance
1. To what extent does your organization have a documented data strategy that aligns with business objectives?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No formal strategy exists</option>
     <option value="2">Basic strategy exists but is not documented</option>
     <option value="3">Documented strategy exists but is not widely communicated</option>
     <option value="4">Well-documented strategy aligned with business objectives and communicated across the organization</option>
     <option value="5">Comprehensive strategy that drives decision-making and resource allocation</option>
   </select>

2. How are data management responsibilities assigned within your organization?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No formal assignment of responsibilities</option>
     <option value="2">Some informal roles exist but are not documented</option>
     <option value="3">Key roles are defined but not consistently implemented</option>
     <option value="4">Formal roles and responsibilities are documented and implemented</option>
     <option value="5">Comprehensive governance structure with clear accountability at all levels</option>
   </select>


### Resource Allocation
3. What resources are specifically allocated to data management activities?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No specific resources allocated</option>
     <option value="2">Limited ad hoc resources as needed</option>
     <option value="3">Part-time resources assigned to data management</option>
     <option value="4">Dedicated resources for core data management functions</option>
     <option value="5">Comprehensive resource allocation across all data management dimensions</option>
   </select>

4. How does your organization invest in data management technology and tools?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No specific investment in data management technology</option>
     <option value="2">Basic tools are available but no strategic investment</option>
     <option value="3">Planned investment in core data management technologies</option>
     <option value="4">Strategic investment in integrated data management technologies</option>
     <option value="5">Continuous investment in advanced data capabilities and innovation</option>
   </select>


### Risk Management
5. How does your organization identify and manage data-related risks?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No formal risk management for data</option>
     <option value="2">Reactive approach to data risks as they arise</option>
     <option value="3">Basic risk assessment for critical data assets</option>
     <option value="4">Formal data risk management process integrated with overall risk management</option>
     <option value="5">Comprehensive data risk framework with preventive and detective controls</option>
   </select>


6. How does your organization ensure compliance with relevant environmental data regulations?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No formal compliance management approach</option>
     <option value="2">Basic awareness of requirements with reactive compliance</option>
     <option value="3">Documented compliance processes for key regulations</option>
     <option value="4">Comprehensive compliance framework with regular assessments</option>
     <option value="5">Proactive compliance management with continuous monitoring</option>
   </select>


### Data Value Creation
7. How does your organization measure the value created from its data assets?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No measurement of data value</option>
     <option value="2">Informal recognition of value in specific cases</option>
     <option value="3">Basic qualitative assessment of data value</option>
     <option value="4">Formal measurement of data value in key areas</option>
     <option value="5">Comprehensive quantitative and qualitative measurement of data as a strategic asset</option>
   </select>


8. To what extent are data-driven insights used in strategic decision-making?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">Minimal use of data in decision-making</option>
     <option value="2">Occasional use of data for specific decisions</option>
     <option value="3">Regular use of data for operational decisions</option>
     <option value="4">Systematic use of data for both strategic and operational decisions</option>
     <option value="5">Data-driven decision culture throughout the organization</option>
   </select>


### Data Quality Management
9. How does executive leadership address data quality issues?

   <select class="form-select">
     <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
     <option value="1">No executive involvement in data quality</option>
     <option value="2">Reactive involvement when major issues arise</option>
     <option value="3">Periodic review of quality metrics</option>
     <option value="4">Regular review of quality with accountability for improvement</option>
     <option value="5">Proactive executive sponsorship of quality initiatives with continuous oversight</option>
   </select>


10. How does your organization ensure the quality of data used in client deliverables and regulatory submissions?

    <select class="form-select">
      <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
      <option value="1">No formal quality assurance process</option>
      <option value="2">Basic review process for critical deliverables</option>
      <option value="3">Standardized quality control for most deliverables</option>
      <option value="4">Comprehensive quality assurance program across all deliverables</option>
      <option value="5">Advanced quality management with predictive capabilities and continuous improvement</option>
    </select>


### Data Innovation
11. How does your organization approach innovation in data management and utilization?

    <select class="form-select">
      <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
      <option value="1">No formal approach to data innovation</option>
      <option value="2">Occasional exploration of new data approaches</option>
      <option value="3">Regular evaluation of new data technologies and methods</option>
      <option value="4">Strategic investment in data innovation aligned with business objectives</option>
      <option value="5">Culture of continuous data innovation with dedicated resources and executive sponsorship</option>
    </select>


12. How does your organization leverage data as a competitive advantage?

    <select class="form-select">
      <option value="" selected disabled>Please select...</option>
      <option value="1">Data not viewed as a competitive factor</option>
      <option value="2">Basic recognition of data's competitive potential</option>
      <option value="3">Specific initiatives to create competitive advantage through data</option>
      <option value="4">Systematic approach to developing data-based competitive advantages</option>
      <option value="5">Data capabilities are a primary source of competitive differentiation</option>
    </select>

## Team Self-Assessment Tool {#sec-appa-team}

### Instructions
This self-assessment is designed for completion by individual teams or work groups. Rate your current practices in each area from 1-5 using the maturity level definitions provided, and identify specific examples or evidence.
